1_collection_of_information.title: 1. Collection of Information
1_collection_of_information.point: 1.1 By using the Petto mobile application ('the App'), you agree to the collection of information necessary for the operation of the application and the improvement of our services.
1_collection_of_information.details: 1.2 The collected information may include personal data such as name, email address, contact information, details about pets, and any other information provided voluntarily.

2_use_of_information.title: 2. Use of Information
2_use_of_information.point: 2.1 The collected information is used to personalize the user experience, provide specific services of the application, and enhance the overall quality of Petto.
2_use_of_information.details: 2.2 The information may also be used to send notifications, alerts, and relevant communications related to the application and pet care.

3_sharing_with_third_parties.title: 3. Sharing Information with Third Parties
3_sharing_with_third_parties.point: 3.1 Petto is committed to not selling, renting, or sharing personal information with third parties without user consent, except as permitted by law.
3_sharing_with_third_parties.details: 3.2 We may share information anonymously and in aggregate for statistical and analytical purposes.

4_information_security.title: 4. Information Security
4_information_security.point: 4.1 Reasonable security measures are implemented to protect user information. However, no internet transmission or electronic storage is entirely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

5_user_access_and_control.title: 5. User Access and Control of Information
5_user_access_and_control.point: 5.1 Users have the right to access, correct, update, or delete their personal information at any time.
5_user_access_and_control.details: 5.2 Users can opt-out of receiving certain types of communications from the application by adjusting their notification preferences.

6_cookies_and_similar_technologies.title: 6. Cookies and Similar Technologies
6_cookies_and_similar_technologies.point: 6.1 Petto may use cookies and similar technologies to enhance the user experience and collect non-personal information about the use of the application.

7_links_to_third_parties.title: 7. Links to Third Parties
7_links_to_third_parties.point: 7.1 The application may contain links to third-party websites. Petto is not responsible for the privacy practices of these sites, and it is recommended to review their privacy policies.

8_changes_to_privacy_policy.title: 8. Changes to the Privacy Policy
8_changes_to_privacy_policy.point: 8.1 Petto reserves the right to modify this policy at any time. Changes will be effective upon publication in the application.
8_changes_to_privacy_policy.details: 8.2 Users will be notified of significant changes to the privacy policy.

9_minors.title: 9. Minors
9_minors.point: 9.1 The application is intended for users over 13 years old. We do not intentionally collect information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided information, please contact us.

10_contact.title: 10. Contact
10_contact.point: For any questions or concerns regarding our privacy policy, contact us at [contact email].
